Download the WBAL Radio App

Listen to WBAL Radio, keep connected with Maryland’s top news, traffic and weather, and interact with your favorite talk shows. Plus, get breaking news sent directly to your phone by activating push alerts. 

iPhone Link: https://apps.apple.com/app/1090-am-wbal-wbal-com-baltimore/id386834691 | Google Play Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jacobsmedia.wbal

Beach Traffic And Weather

Heading down to the beach? Make sure to check out the weather and the latest traffic conditions as you head to the Bay Bridge. Tune in for traffic and weather reports on WBAL NewsRadio 1090 and FM 101.5.

Listen To WBAL On Your Smart Speaker

We have an easy way for you to get WBAL on your Amazon device. Simply tell your Alexa – “Alexa, launch WBAL” OR you can get the skill directlyHERE – and make sure to write us an awesome review. Plus – you can hear us on Google Home – Just say “Hey Google, Play WBAL”
